data.quote: Love For All, Hatred For None.
data.author: Khalifatul Masih

data.quote: Change the world by being yourself.
data.author: Amy Poehler

data.quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Aspire to inspire before we expire.
data.author: Amy Poehler

data.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: The only joy in the world is to begin
data.author: Cesare Pavese

data.quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
data.author: Confusious

data.quote: It is more fitting for a man to laugh at life than to lament over it
data.author: Seneca
